meanings.sent1: I was noticing the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys noticing the birds chirping in the morning.
meanings.sent3: Noticing the cat chasing its tail always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a detective, noticing every detail in the room.
meanings.sent5: Noticing the rainbow after the rain made her day brighter.

meanings.definition: To pay attention to; take notice of.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was noticing the students' progress in class.
meanings.sent2: He kept noticing the changes in the weather forecast.
meanings.sent3: Noticing the dog trying to hide a bone was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She was like a hawk, noticing any movement around her.
meanings.sent5: Noticing the warning signs early can prevent accidents.
